Sweetzer, a fervent fundamentalist, has been in contact with the charismatic preacher as a last resort, believing that her teenage daughter, Nell (Ashley Bell), is possessed by a demon that must exorcise before her ordeal eventually became an unimaginable tragedy. 

Unable to endure the pangs of conscience that bears make money after years of desperate believers, Cotton seeks with his team filming a documentary confessional you want to be his last exorcism. However, upon arriving at the family farm, completely covered in blood, will soon become evident that nothing could have prepared him for the real evil that is there. Now it's too late to turn back, the Rev. Marcus will be tested when their deepest beliefs, along with his crew, have to find a way to save Nell, and themselves, before it's too late .
